name: Illuminator Liquid Highlight
about: What it is: A concentrated liquid shimmer that can be added to your foundation, primer, moisturizer, or simply used alone for a super-highlighted glow...Highlighted Ingredients:.-Oleogel & Adhesive Film Former: Ultra-blendable texture that delivers a buildable, soft metallic glow..-Ultra Refined Pearlescent Pigments: Impart a sheer, multi-dimensional candle-lit glow to your complexion...Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, and mineral oil. This product is also vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free...What Else You Need to Know: Whether worn alone as an enhancer or mixed with your foundation, primer, or moisturizer for a soft-focus effect, this illuminator lends light to dull, lackluster complexions and looks stunning when blended along cheek and brow bones to accentuate the high points of your face.
ingredients: -Oleogel & Adhesive Film Former: Ultra-blendable texture that delivers a buildable, soft metallic glow..-Ultra Refined Pearlescent Pigments: Impart a sheer, multi-dimensional candle-lit glow to your complexion....Hydrogenated Didecene Isododecane Hydrogenated Polyisobutene Mica Hydrogenated Polycyclopentadiene Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer Triethoxycaprylylsilane 1,2-Hexanediol Caprylyl Glycol May Contain: CI 77491 (Iron Oxides) CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Add drops of your Illuminator to cheekbones, tip of the nose, collarbones, and cupidu2018s bow..-Use your fingers to tap the product in, gently blending it for a beautiful, high-gloss look..-This super-versatile product can be added to many products in your makeup bag for a touch of luxe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a complimentary bottle of the Iconic Illuminator Liquid Highlight in Original in exchange for my honest review. This illuminator is an outstanding choice for anyone seeking a luminous glow with a luxurious feel. It offers a concentrated shimmer that can be seamlessly integrated with your foundation, primer, or moisturizer. Alternatively, it shines brightly when used alone, highlighting the cheekbones, nose tip, collarbones, and cupid's bow with just a few drops.  The application is a breeze; the formula is designed to be ultra-blendable, allowing for a smooth glide and a perfect blend into the skin without any hassles. This ease of use is enhanced by the product's buildable nature, making it suitable for both a subtle shine and a more intense glow.  One of the most striking effects of the Iconic Illuminator is its ability to provide a 'soft focus' effect that beautifully accentuates high points of the face with a radiant, dewy finish. The shimmering drops enhance your natural features, providing a healthy, glowing look that doesn't feel overdone.  Durability is another strong point of this illuminator. It maintains its radiant effect throughout the day without the need for touch-ups, making it reliable for long-lasting wear.  Overall, the Iconic Illuminator Liquid Highlight is a top-tier product that delivers on its promises of luminosity, ease of application, and lasting wear. Itu2019s no wonder that it comes highly endorsed by celebrities and makeup professionals. If you're looking to elevate your makeup routine with a touch of glamour, this illuminator is definitely worth the investment.

reviews.review_text: Thank you, Iconic London, for the Illuminator Liquid Highlight sample! This liquid highlighter is quite dazzling in its original color, which has a soft champagne shimmer. reviews.review_title: Just as good as everyone says it is!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While highlighter used to be an essential part of my makeup routine, it has taken a back seat to blush over the last few months. However, I still love all things glow, so I jumped at the chance to test out the super hyped up liquid highlighter from Iconic London! I have only used this once so far and that was in the traditional highlighter way - applying it to the high points of my face. All of the pigment and high shine may seem daunting, so thatu2019s why I recommend putting a small amount on the back of your hand, spreading it out, and then using a cream product specific brush or damp sponge to pick it up and apply it onto your face. That way, it will apply as more of a wash of glow than a streak. Also, once dried down, this doesnu2019t budge! I canu2019t wait to keep using it and absolutely recommend it for beginners and pros alike!

reviews.review_title: My Iconic London Illuminator Experience: Glowing f
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who's always on the lookout for that perfect glow, I can confidently say that the Iconic London Illuminator Liquid Highlight is a game-changer. From the moment I apply it, I feel like I'm radiating light from within.  The formula is a dream to work with. It's so lightweight and easy to blend, yet the pigmentation is incredible. A little goes a long way, and it gives me that dewy finish I've always wanted without feeling heavy or cakey.  What I love most is its versatility. Whether I want a subtle, everyday glow or a more intense shimmer for a night out, this highlighter delivers. I can mix it with my foundation or apply it directly to the high points of my face for targeted luminosity. And let's not forget about the gorgeous shades! No matter my mood or makeup look, there's always a perfect match.  And can we talk about the packaging? It's so sleek and stylish, it feels like a treat every time I reach for it. It's the little things that make a difference, you know?  Overall, the Iconic London Illuminator has become a staple in my makeup routine. It's my secret weapon for looking and feeling my best, no matter the occasion. If you're in search of that lit-from-within glow, look no further. Trust me, you won't be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from BzzAgent and Iconic London in exchange for my honest review and opinion. If you're not new to makeup, you know this highlighter is just as the brand suggests; Iconic. It's been around forever and has gone viral several times... but I must admit, with all of the liquid and powder highlighter options on the market, after trying and reviewing this one, it wouldn't be the first I reached for.  The amount of working time you're given before the product dries down on your skin is less than a minute. If you apply it and immediately work it where you want it, it's quite pretty, but do ONE CHEEK at a time.  Don't be like me and dot both cheeks at the same time and then work on each one separately for a couple minutes; one side dried down and left the dots behind (see pic). I was able to reapply my foundation over it to correct. (I did try using a sponge, finger AND brush for application, finger works best).  If you're dying to try this, the mini would probably suffice; the tiniest bit goes a long way and would last a while.  I did like that it's versatile and could use it other ways too. (Like as an eyeshadow primer). Overall, I'd recommend, I suppose if you really want to try. Just be careful with letting the product sit too long.

reviews.review_text: I recently had the pleasure of trying the Iconic London Illuminator Liquid Highlight, and I must say, it's truly a game-changer in my makeup routine. The illuminator adds a stunning, radiant glow to my complexion, leaving my skin looking luminous and dewy. What's even better is that I had the opportunity to try this product for free in exchange for my honest review, and I'm thrilled to say it exceeded my expectations.The formula is lightweight and blendable, allowing for effortless application and buildable coverage. Whether I'm going for a subtle sheen or a more intense highlight, this product delivers every time. Not only does the Iconic London Illuminator enhance my natural features, but it also stays put all day long without fading or creasing. It's become a staple in my makeup collection, and I can't recommend it enough to anyone looking to add a luminous touch to their look.

I set this using Urban Decay all nighter spray and it lasted throughout my 8-hour shift.   As another reviewer mentioned, a little goes a long way. Initially, when i pulled the bottle out of the box i was crushed because it seemed soo small and i thought it wouldn't last long. But then i discovered you really don't need any more than a pinch. Like, a really small dallop. The dot on my hand is not even half of what I used. And the shine is soo flattering and makes my cheekbones pop. It's buildable so you can also layer more product to intensity the shine, but i personally like more of a natural look.  i'm so happy this worked out. my favorite highlighter by far. :))

As ai have medium-deep skin, I use shade Original on top of Iconic London's Radiance Complexion Booster in Toffee Glow for depth, and Bronze Glow for all over coverage. Paired with a medium coverage concealer beneath the eyes, a lippie. and mascara, I am out the door! The possibilities are endless! And one bottle will easily last 100+ applications, because one drop is plenty! A price point of $40 is a steal compared to celebrity-endorsed, inferior products. Try a Charlotte Tilbury powder to seal, and be ready to take on the world! I am 58, and look faboo!

I did this, and they do blend beautifully, it is gorgeous but unfortunately fades very quickly as it dries.  If I'm going for a fuller makeup look, I still add my powdered highlighter, blush, and bronzer for more colour.  But this is beautiful for a poolside summer day with just my SPF and mascara with no powders.  Overall, I like this product but I don't love it - it fades too fast and is overpriced.  Would recommend this line if they match their prices with the drugstore quality that they are, but not when they're comparable in price to higher end makeup lines.  Full disclosure, I also purchased the JLo beauty highlighter at the same time, and two days in a row, tried each product on each cheek and JLo stuck longer.
